content: cotton retention bandage crocheted skill level beginner size 3 inches width x 48 inches length or 4 inches x 48 inches recommended thread these are bandages and must be thin -100% cotton or mercerized cotton thread -lace weight cyc #0 -26-27 wraps per inch wpi -undyed white natural cream off-white bare color -no colored yarn dyes may irritate open wounds thread requirement -1 crocheted bandage weighs 60-65 grams -2 monaco 3ply balls 40g = 1 bandage -monaco 3ply cone 250g = 3 crocheted bandages crocheted cotton retention bandage page 1 thread options please get white offwhite cream ecru natural bare undyed and similar shades >philippines -monaco mercerized cotton 3-ply ball 40 grams or cone b1 or b10 -cannon mercerized cotton ball 50 grams or cone white natural mb116 -monaco cck83 3-ply cone >abroad -aunt lydia s crochet thread classic 10 -anchor freccia no 8 -bella baby tootgarook 4ply 21 wpi good for standard knitting machine -bendigo woollen mills cotton 4ply -dmc cebelia crochet cotton no 10 -dmc babylo crochet cotton thread size 10 -dmc petra 5 -hobbii rainbow lace natural white 002 -hobby lobby artiste no 8 crochet cotton thicker thread -knitpicks/crochet com curio no 10 -red heart classic crochet thread size 10 -sullivans mercerized cotton -sullivans natural soft crochet knitting cotton -sullivans soft crochet & knitting yarn -sullivans crochet cotton satin -threadart 100% pure cotton crochet thread size 10 -yarn art begonia -yarn art lily size 10 tools crochet hook 2 0-3 0 mm for those using size 10 thread - 1 5-2 0 mm hook sizes are just recommendations you may adjust your hook size to achieve the right fabric gauge medium not too tight and not too loose gauge any gauge crocheted cotton retention bandage page 2 crochet instructions us terms -chain enough stitches to measure 3 inches or 4 inches in width -row 1 starting on second chain from hook single_crochet single_crochet into each chain turn -row 2 chain 1 this does not count as a stitch single_crochet through both loops of each preceding single_crochet turn the ch1 adds stability to the edge -repeat row 2 until length is 48 inches -weave in the yarn ends -roll the bandage and secure to prevent unrolling -no other substitute stitch like double_crochet half_double_crochet tunisian no crocheted border please note 1 the bandages do not have to perfect it is okay if it is not exactly 3 inches wide the acceptable width is between 2 7/8 inches and 3 1/8 inches for 4-inch wide bandages the acceptable width is between 3 7/8 inches and 4 1/8 inches 2 bandages have to be clean if necessary please wash in detergent with mild scent please wrap or put in clean plastic before shipping it does not have to be individually wrapped you may put several bandages into one big plastic bag why the need for cotton bandages -these can be washed and reused -these do not wear out too fast unlike gauge and other bandages please send finished bandages to department
